sec.p:
A Fortran 90 program (REDFIT)
47 is used to test if peaks in the spectrum of a time series are significant against the red noise background from a first-order autoregressive (AR1) process. The spectrum of an irregularly spaced time series is determined without the need for interpolation by means of the Lomb-Scargle Fourier transform
48, 49 . A Matlab code of this program available online https://www.geo.uni-bremen.de/geomod/staff/mschulz/#software is used to determine the significant periodicities against the red noise.
